TopicTitle: New To KSP? Welcome Aboard! Try this for a first launch.

Articles.Content:
The WorkShops of RedRockets is proud to present...

Atlas

(A Great First Time Rocket for New KSP Members)

Cheap, Easy, and Does What You Tell It.

Easy Launches, Highly Responsive Controls, Limits Over-correction!!

UnLimited Orbit for MUN or Solar Missions.

MEI capsule is my new favorite for moon missions!

Its like a free stage with huge weight to thrust numbers as well as high fuel efficiency!!

And for the poorly trained pilots.... No Landing Gear is needed for a moon flight and landing.

Pics 4&5 : This Capsule Is Tough!!

I am rolling around on the moon trying to stand on my nose!

RRs

For those who are \'New To KSP\' a list of used addons would be quite handy. Along with a quick reference where do they find these addons.

Its like a free stage with huge -snip-

More likely \'three stage\', eh?
